name: Mareo Go Kart Galaxy Strikers 40/5
description:
Mareo Go Kart Galaxy Strikers 40/5 is a fighting game developed using M.U.G.E.N.

The game was made for fun by a group of italian friends who had literally nothing else to do.

This is an ongoing project, we're adding several new characters with new updates for balancing the game.

The game is only in italian, but it's pretty self explanatory, so you don't need to worry about the language barrier.

I hope you have fun trying to play our game!
